description.en: Open the page in App Store and install the app. Launch it, in the VPN configuration permission window click Allow and enter your passcode.
Click the button below ‚Äî the app will open and the subscription will be added automatically
In the main section, click the large power button in the center to connect to VPN. Don't forget to select a server from the server list. If needed, choose another server from the server list.
Open the page in App Store and install the app. Launch it, in the VPN configuration permission window click Allow and enter your passcode.
Click the button below ‚Äî the app will open and the subscription will be added automatically
In the main section, click the large power button in the center to connect to VPN. Don't forget to select a server from the server list. If needed, choose another server from the server list.
Choose the version for your device, click the button below and install the app.
If you have previously used Clash Verge Rev, you need to uninstall it before installing Koala Clash.
Click the button below to add subscription

title.en: If the subscription is not added

description.en: If nothing happens after clicking the button, add the subscription manually. Click the Get Link button in the top right corner of this page, copy the link. In Koala Clash, go to the main page, click the Add Profile button, paste the link into the text field, and then click the Import button.
You can select a server at the bottom of the main page, and enable VPN by clicking on the large button in the center of the main page.
Choose the package matching your architecture and install Prizrak-Box.
Run the program.
Click the button below to add the subscription automatically.

title.en: If the subscription is not added

description.en: If nothing happens after clicking the button, add the subscription manually. On this page, click the Get Link button in the upper right corner, copy the link. In Prizrak-Box, go to the Profiles section, click the + button, paste your copied link, and click Confirm.
Select the added subscription in the Profiles section. You can choose the server country in the Proxy (üöÄ) section. Set the TUN switch to ON.
Choose the version for your device, click the button below and install the app.
Click the button below to add subscription

title.en: If the subscription is not added

description.en: If nothing happens after clicking the button, add a subscription manually. Click the Get link button on this page in the upper right corner, copy the link. In FlClash, go to the Profiles section, click the + button, select the URL, paste your copied link and click Send

Select the added profile in the Profiles section. In the Dashboard, click the enable button in the lower right corner, and then turn on the switch next to the TUN item. After launching, in the Proxy section, you can change the choice of the server to which you will be connected.
Choose the version for your device, click the button below and install the app.
Click the button below ‚Äî the app will open and the subscription will be added automatically
In the main section, click the large power button in the center to connect to VPN. Don't forget to select a server from the server list. If needed, choose another server from the server list.
Choose the version for your device, click the button below and install the app.

If you have previously used Clash Verge Rev, you need to uninstall it before installing Koala Clash. ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: If you get a notification that the application is corrupted when you run it on macOS, run this command in Terminal: sudo xattr -r -c /Applications/Koala\ Clash.app

Click the button below to add subscription

title.en: If the subscription is not added

description.en: If nothing happens after clicking the button, add a subscription manually. Click the Get link button on this page in the upper right corner, copy the link. In Flowvy, go to the Profiles section, click the + button, select the URL, paste your copied link and click Send

Select the added profile in the Profiles section. In the Control Panel, click the Enable button in the bottom right corner. Once it's running, you can change the server you're connected to in the Proxy section.
Download and install FlClash APK
Click the button below to add subscription

Select the added profile in the Profiles section. In the Control Panel, click the Enable button in the bottom right corner. Once it's running, you can change the server you're connected to in the Proxy section.

Open the page in the App Store on your Apple TV and install the app. Launch it, allow VPN configuration if prompted, and enter your passcode if required.
Detailed instructions to help you set up Happ on your device.
Click the button below to add subscription, if you opened the subscription page on your TV
Open the app and connect to the server
Choose your architecture (installer preferred for automatic integration) and install or unzip Prizrak-Box.
Run the program as an administrator.
Click the button below to add the subscription automatically.

text.en: How to install APK on TV

description.en: Download and install FlClash APK on your TV. Most modern TVs use ARMv8 (64-bit). If installation fails, try ARMv7 (32-bit). x86_64 is for TVs or boxes with Intel or AMD processors (rare).

title.en: How to add a subscription on TV

description.en: In the TV app, click the Add Profile button in the Profiles section, select Add from phone. On your phone, in the Profiles section, tap the three-dot menu and choose Send to TV.
Click the button below to add subscription, if you opened the subscription page on your TV

title.en: If the subscription is not added

description.en: If nothing happens after clicking the button, add a subscription manually. Click the Get link button on this page in the upper right corner, copy the link. In FlClash, go to the Profiles section, click the + button, select the URL, paste your copied link and click Send

Select the added profile in the Profiles section. In the Control Panel, click the Enable button in the bottom right corner. Once it's running, you can change the server you're connected to in the Proxy section.

scanQrCode.en: Scan the QR code above in the client

scanQrCodeDescription.en: Easily add the subscription to any client. There's another option: copy the link below and paste it into the client
